title: M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Quarterly Series Ratio 10x
description: This is a variation of the M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Quarterly Series dataset. It is filtered to limit the history to be 10x the forecast length which is 8 time steps. This dataset comprises 75 quarterly time series, each spanning March 1998 to June 2017, randomly sampled from the M4 forecasting competition. These series provide a consistent historical window and are ideal for exploring long-term trends and forecasting challenges on quarterly-frequency series drawn from across various sectors.

timeField.name: quarter
timeField.description: Date representing quarter of year of measurement.
